Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 17-231 rewrote par. (3), which had read as follows:

"(3) Marry or obtain a divorce, annulment, or dissolution of marriage;".

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 213 of Mental Health Service Delivery Reform Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-144, October 23, 2001, 48 DCR 9947).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-56, see notes following § 7-1231.01.

For Law 17-231, see notes following § 7-621.

sections.text: Hold a professional, occupational, or motor vehicle driver's license;
Marry or enter into a domestic partnership, or obtain a divorce, annulment, or dissolution of marriage or a termination of a domestic partnership in accordance with § 32-702(d).
Enjoy all benefits and privileges guaranteed by law.
